name: Love is Blind, But So Is Hate
name_original: Love is Blind, But So Is Hate
description:
Made for Brackeys Jam #2 with the theme "Love is Blind"

You play as two lovers who can be harmful to each other,  but also need each other to survive. You must fight off the blind hatred of evil cupids and hateful spirits with blind, forgiving, love, and arrows. One of you can place shields, and the other can shoot, gaining exp for more shields. If you get too close to your lover, within their circle, you will take damage.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to switch between players.
  • Left Click to shoot with one lover, Left Click to place shields with the other, 

Exp and shields

  • You gain exp with each enemy you kill.
  •  Any amount of  exp can be used to make a shield. 
  • Your exp will determine how large the shield is.  The blue bar below one player shows how much exp you have.
  • You can shoot through shields, but enemies cannot.
  • Enemies will take damage while being in contact with a shield.
  • Shields take damage when in direct contact of anything else(Players, Enemies, Other Shields)
